Question.Subject: Internet Problem - Why do I need to keep refreshing?
Question.Content: Hey, I've noticed an odd happening with my browser recently (Firefox). Almost every time I click on a link, for example, signing in to this website - the page reloads but nothing has happened. Then, when I refresh the page it acknowledges that I am signed in and shows me the appropriate updated page. Pretty much all links have been behaving like this. Any one know what the problem could be?
Question.ChosenAnswer: you have to much things or a virus in your pc ,

Answer.Content: you have to much things or a virus in your pc ,

Same thing happens me sometimes:
try this
Go to control panel. Then Internet Options Browsing History - Settings
Make sure the dot is on "Automatically"
Davy
